span.span:
NSCSD schools will be closed through May 15 with homeschooling expected throughout the closure
This year's Regents exams have been canceled by New York State

The spring sports season will not begin until at least May 15
The May and June SAT Exams at C-NS High School are cancelled
The April 25 Festival of the Arts is cancelled
The May 15 C-NS Junior Prom is cancelled
All athletic facilities, including outdoor tracks, are closed
All school playgrounds are closed
